intent_analysis:
Intent: The user, Dmitriy, wants to enhance the appearance of the living room by making it visually impressive or extravagant, likely through lighting adjustments using the available meross Light Strip devices.  
Constraints & cues: The user has not specified any particular styles, themes, or specific actions to achieve the desired effect, and there are multiple meross Light Strip devices in the living room that can be controlled.  
Risk assessment: There is ambiguity regarding which specific meross Light Strip device to control and what exact actions (color change, brightness adjustment, etc.) to take to achieve the "redonkulous" look; clarification is needed to avoid misinterpretation.
environment_overview:
1) 检测到的设备及位置：在客厅中有多个 meross 灯带设备。第一个设备（ID: 22e11820-64fa-4bed-ad8f-f98ef66de298）具备开关、亮度调节、色温和颜色控制的能力。第二个设备（ID: 363f714d-e4fe-4052-a78c-f8c97542e709）同样具备这些能力。第三个设备（ID: 571f0327-6507-4674-b9cf-fe68f7d9522d）也具备相同的能力。所有设备的主要组件均为主组件。

2) 当前状态及控制提示：第一个设备的开关状态为开启，亮度级别为70，颜色饱和度为100，颜色为1。第二个设备的开关状态未知，亮度级别为48，颜色和饱和度均未设置。第三个设备的开关状态为开启，亮度级别为35，颜色饱和度为100，颜色为1。根据用户的命令，可以通过控制这些设备的开关、亮度和颜色来实现所需效果。
